ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Horizons (was Official confirmation from Ester)
ygData.msgSnippet: UWOO= Ultima World Online Origin.  When Richard Garriot left Origin/EA they changed the official name of the game from UO2 to UWOO, or Origin for short. Galtin
ygData.messageBody:
UWOO= Ultima World Online Origin. When Richard Garriot left Origin/EA they
changed the official name of the game from UO2 to UWOO, or Origin for short.


Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Friday, September 08, 2000 11:35 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Horizons (was Official confirmation from Ester)



Pardon me if I missed it earlier in the thread - what does UWOO stand for?

Thanks

Dan
